Title: Project Planning and Analysis for Development
Author: ডেভিড পটস্‌
Summary: A text on project planning and analysis in developing countries, this book focuses on the economic and financial analysis of projects. The author examines the issues that arise before a project is appraised, and tackles the difficult problems that arise for project planners, such as inflation.
Book_Title: Project Planning and Analysis for Development
